// Pivot 0, 0
int flipperLeft[24] = {
	0, 7,
	0, 7,
	7, 0,
	21, 0,
	68, 30,
	74, 38,
	74, 46,
	68, 52,
	60, 52,
	6, 32,
	0, 25,
	0, 7
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float flipperLeft[24] = {
	0.000000f, 0.129630f,
	0.000000f, 0.129630f,
	0.093333f, 0.000000f,
	0.280000f, 0.000000f,
	0.906667f, 0.555556f,
	0.986667f, 0.703704f,
	0.986667f, 0.851852f,
	0.906667f, 0.962963f,
	0.800000f, 0.962963f,
	0.080000f, 0.592593f,
	0.000000f, 0.462963f,
	0.000000f, 0.129630f
};
